title: Drawing, "Design for a Centerpiece (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 68
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: MILIEU DE TABLE/ (PLAN); in graphite to right: B; in pen and black ink at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/5.41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Circular body drawn in plan with scalloped outer edge and scalloped finial indicated in green ink. Underdrawing in graphite.
Elevation drawing of centerpiece in Puiforcat collection 91995-164-44).
Puiforcat collection contains archival photographs of centerpiece, Box 7, Folder 12, "Centerpieces, round" # 9471.
Puiforcat fabrication #: 9471.
